server_configuration.name: STEEL_LOCAL
server_configuration.description: Determines if Steel Voyager runs in local (true) or cloud (false) mode.

server_configuration.name: STEEL_API_KEY
server_configuration.description: Required only when STEEL_LOCAL = false. Used to authenticate requests with the Steel endpoint.

server_configuration.name: STEEL_BASE_URL
server_configuration.description: The base URL for the Steel API. Override this if self-hosting the Steel server (either locally or in your own cloud environment). If STEEL_LOCAL = true and STEEL_BASE_URL is unset, it defaults to http://localhost:3000.

server_configuration.name: GLOBAL_WAIT_SECONDS
server_configuration.description: Optional. Number of seconds to wait after each tool action (for instance, to allow slow-loading pages).
